name: Thunderstorm
desc: Inflicts Shock on a random target. Crit dmg up.

name: Heat Wave
desc: Inflicts Burn on a random target. If inflicted with Burn multiple times, take damage equal to max HP.

name: Pollen Warning
desc: Gives a random debuff to a random target. Increases spiritual ailments in battle.

name: Flu Season
desc: Increases elemental ailment resist during battle. Shadows may be affected by Influenza: Become Berserk, greatly increasing Attack, but die after a few turns.

name: Clear
desc: Grants a random buff on a random target. When a foe is granted a Defense decrease, remove a random buff and increase damage taken.
